document.heading: Allen Chapel A.M.E. Senior Residential Rental Project Property Tax Exemption and Equitable Real Property Tax Relief Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-288, the “Allen Chapel A.M.E. Senior Residential Rental Project Property Tax Exemption and Equitable Real Property Tax Relief Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-198, which was referred to the Committee Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 5, 2010, and November 9, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 19, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-609 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-288 became effective on March 8, 2011.
